sentences.english: There are reports of microbes surviving for much longer in a kind of suspended animation.
sentences.chinese: 还有报道称有的微生物在某种假死状态下活得更久。

sentences.english: Suspended isn't broken. It's just suspended.
sentences.chinese: 假死状态并没有被破坏什么，只是暂停。

sentences.english: YET EVEN IN his deathless state, the Emperor continues his eternal vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 即使在他的假死状态中，帝皇的警醒亘古依然。

sentences.english: Feigning death occurs in a wide range of animal groups. This antipredator behavior enhances fitness of population in some species.
sentences.chinese: 假死行为广泛存在于动物界的各个类群中。

sentences.english: Some people believe that he faked his own death and ran off to Argentina.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为他假死，并逃到了阿根廷。

sentences.english: Damage reduction while feign death removed.
sentences.chinese: 假死是受到伤害减少效果移除。

sentences.english: Improved Feign Death renamed to Survival tactics and moved from Tier 4 to Tier 3.
sentences.chinese: 强化假死改名为生存计谋，从第4层移动到第3层。

sentences.english: The dahlias died down when we had the first cold spell.
sentences.chinese: 第一次寒潮袭来时，大丽花的枝叶枯萎而假死了。

definition: to be reborn/to recover/to come back to life/to regenerate
lit. the cicada sheds its carapace (idiom); fig. to vanish leaving an empty shell/a crafty escape plan
to put poison in sth/to poison
to return from the grave/(old) to recycle (waste products)
lit. the plum tree withers in place of the peach tree/to substitute one thing for another/to carry the can for sb
lit. reincarnated in sb else's body (idiom); fig. a discarded or discredited idea returns in another guise
to kill secretly/to stab in the back
to checkmate (in chess)/to be about to die
nearing death/on the point of demise/approaching extinction
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
